meanings.definition: A chemical group consisting of a propylene molecule with one hydrogen atom removed.
meanings.sent1: The propenyl in the molecule plays a crucial role in its structure.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the effects of propenyl on different compounds.
meanings.sent3: The propenyl group decided to invite the hydrogen atom to a party.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like a propenyl, always adding a unique touch to everything.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the propenyl stood out like a bright star in the night sky.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a chemical compound containing a propenyl group.
meanings.sent1: The propenyl compound showed interesting properties under testing.
meanings.sent2: Chemists are exploring new ways to synthesize propenyl compounds.
meanings.sent3: The propenyl solution bubbled happily in the beaker.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as vibrant as a propenyl compound in a sea of dull chemicals.
meanings.sent5: The propenyl scent filled the room, leaving a lasting impression on everyone present.
